'''Brenda''' is the maid [[Chandler Bing|Chandler]] hired in [[The One With The Stain]]. [[Monica Geller|Monica]] thinks she's stealing from them, as she's wearing the same jeans and bra that Monica has. When Monica, then Chandler later go over the edge while trying to prove that they're right, she quits, which seems fair to Monica.
